skills.name: Multiple Cluster Missiles
skills.description: Launches homing missiles at multiple targets. Longer charge time. Slightly decreased DMG when hitting the same target multiple times.1st Sequence: 3 missiles.2nd Sequence: 7 missiles.3rd Sequence: 15 missiles.

skills.name: Frost Stare
skills.description: [SP: 12][CD: 20s] For 6.50s, the character's attacks slow enemies' Move Speed and Attack Speed by 60% for 3.5s.
